title: r/Choosingbeggars Seeking Fulltime UNPAID Secretary / S*x Slave
description: r/Choosingbeggars Ladies, do you hate money? Do you love working for a sexist jerk who think that he's the next Tony Stark? Then I've got the perfect job for you! This "employer" is looking for a cute girl to work as his fulltime UNPAID secretary. But don't worry! Once his business becomes profitable, he will finally start paying you a salary. Just think of the potential! You could become his very own Pepper Potts!
